languages.text: "В таком случае не вижу смысла спорить — приговор для мерзавца очевиден".
"In that case, I see no point in arguing. What the scoundrel's sentence should be is obvious."
languages.original_text: "В таком случае не вижу смысла спорить — приговор для мерзавца очевиден".

traits.locale_text: "In that case, I see no point in arguing. What the scoundrel's sentence should be is obvious."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "In that case, I see no point in arguing. What the scoundrel's sentence should be is obvious."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "In that case, I see no point in arguing. What the scoundrel's sentence should be is obvious."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "In that case, I see no point in arguing. What the scoundrel's sentence should be is obvious."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "In that case, I see no point in arguing. What the scoundrel's sentence should be is obvious."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "In that case, I see no point in arguing. What the scoundrel's sentence should be is obvious."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “既然如此，我认为没必要再争论了。这个恶棍的刑罚显而易见。”
languages.original_text: "In that case, I see no point in arguing. What the scoundrel's sentence should be is obvious."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，我认为没必要再争论了。这个恶棍的刑罚显而易见。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「そうとなれば、ここで言い争いをする意味はない。あの悪党の量刑がどうなるかは明らかだ」
languages.original_text: "In that case, I see no point in arguing. What the scoundrel's sentence should be is obvious."

traits.locale_text: 「そうとなれば、ここで言い争いをする意味はない。あの悪党の量刑がどうなるかは明らかだ」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «En ese caso no le veo sentido a discutir. La sentencia es obvia».
languages.original_text: "In that case, I see no point in arguing. What the scoundrel's sentence should be is obvious."

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso no le veo sentido a discutir. La sentencia es obvia».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Dann sehe ich keinen Sinn in einer Diskussion. Es ist offensichtlich, welche Strafe angemessen ist."
languages.original_text: "In that case, I see no point in arguing. What the scoundrel's sentence should be is obvious."

traits.locale_text: "Dann sehe ich keinen Sinn in einer Diskussion. Es ist offensichtlich, welche Strafe angemessen ist."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, je ne vois pas le problème. La sentence de ce scélérat est toute trouvée. »
languages.original_text: "In that case, I see no point in arguing. What the scoundrel's sentence should be is obvious."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, je ne vois pas le problème. La sentence de ce scélérat est toute trouvée. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Bu durumda tartışmanın bir anlamı yok diye düşünüyorum. Hainin cezasının ne olması gerektiği belli."
languages.original_text: "In that case, I see no point in arguing. What the scoundrel's sentence should be is obvious."

traits.locale_text: "Bu durumda tartışmanın bir anlamı yok diye düşünüyorum. Hainin cezasının ne olması gerektiği belli."
traits.speaker: Chorda
